ModMetaData.name: [KYD] JoyKind: Alcohol
ModMetaData.author: Kayedon
ModMetaData.description:
<size=24>JoyKind: Alcohol</size>
Adds Alcohol as its own JoyKind, with a new JoyGiver, to separate alcohol as a recreation item from drugs. Compatible with any mod that adds alcohol, provided their chemical contains the word "Alcohol".
